meanings: (여럿 가운데서) distinguish[differentiate] (A from B), make a distinction (between A and B)
(음식 등을) be choosy, be fussy (about), (informal) be picky (about)
(보이지 않도록) hide, cover, (formal) conceal, screen (sth from sth), obscure; (보호하다) shield
be willing to take any risk

vlive.korean: [진정한 실력자는 장비를 가리지 않는다 - by. 갓태현] 41, 42, 43, 44... [Don't blame the tools. by God TAEHYUN] 41, 42, 43, 44... 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.4
vlive.english: [Don't blame the tools. by God TAEHYUN] 41, 42, 43, 44...

vlive.korean: 찬이 형 - 너 가리지 않은 거야? Chan. - Aren't you covered up?? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : Happy 승민 Day🐶🥞
가리지는 말자. Let's not cover it. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [V PICK! HOW TO in V] 아이즈원의 프듀48댄스💖 (HOW TO DANCE IZ*ONE’s PRODUCE 48 dance)
딱히 가리지 않아요. I'm not particularly picky about it. 듣기 View video fromis_9 : 여보세요📞 점심 먹었니~?!🤔
vlive.english: I'm not particularly picky about it.

vlive.korean: 저희는 가리지 않아요 다 가요! We don't discriminate! We'll go everywhere! 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 오랜만🐢
vlive.english: We don't discriminate! We'll go everywhere!

examples.korean: He’s started staying out till all hours. 발음듣기 그가 시간을 가리지 않고 늦게까지 집에 안 들어오기 시작했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He’s started staying out till all hours. 발음

examples.korean: She devoured everything she could lay her hands on: books, magazines and newspapers. 발음듣기 그녀는 뭐든 손에 닿는 것이면, 책이든 잡지든 신문이든 가리지 않고 집어삼킬듯이 읽어 댔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She devoured everything she could lay her hands on: books, magazines and newspapers. 발음

examples.korean: Shooting once-in-a-lifetime photos from enviable locations ― mainly for social media ― has become an increasingly popular fad in recent years, regardless of age. 발음듣기 남들이 부러워하는 장소에서 '인생 사진'을 찍어 소셜미디어에 올리는 것은 최근 몇 년 동안 남녀노소 가리지 않는 유행이 되었다. The Korea Times
examples.english: Shooting once-in-a-lifetime photos from enviable locations ― mainly for social media ― has become an increasingly popular fad in recent years, regardless of age. 발음

examples.korean: Never [It is never] too late to mend. 발음듣기 (속담) 잘못을 고침에 때를 가리지 마라. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Never [It is never] too late to mend. 발음

examples.korean: When Alexander the Great visited Diogenes and asked whether he could do anything for the famed teacher, Diogenes replied: 'Only stand out of my light.' Perhaps some day we shall know how to heighten creativity. Until then, one of the best things we can do for creative men and women is to stand out of their light. (John W. Gardner) 발음듣기 알렉산더 대왕이 디오게니스를 찾아가 그와 같은 현인을 위해 자기가 뭘 해줄 수 있을지 물었다. 디오게이스는 "빛을 가리고 계시니 비켜서 주십시오" 하고 말했다. 언젠가는 창의력을 증진시키는 방법을 알게 될 지도 모르겠다. 그러나 그 전까지 우리가 할 수 있는 최선은 창의적인 이들 앞에 서서 빛을 가리지 않는 것이다. (존 W. 가드너, 성공명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: When Alexander the Great visited Diogenes and asked whether he could do anything for the famed teacher, Diogenes replied: 'Only stand out of my light.' Perhaps some day we shall know how to heighten creativity. Until then, one of the best things we can do for creative men and women is to stand out of their light. (John W. Gardner) 발음
